com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class Map.Scheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.Map.Scheme
  • Enclosing class:
    Map

    public static final class Map.Scheme
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a collection of schemes that the Map class supports. Each of the schemes in this class can be set by way of the Map.setMapScheme(String) method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HYBRID_DAY
      Satellite tile scheme presented in "day" colors, with visible roads.
      static java.lang.String NORMAL_DAY
      Normal scheme presented in "day" colors.
      static java.lang.String NORMAL_DAY_GREY
      Normal scheme presented in "day" colors that is suitable for use cases in which map still has a high relevance but is used as background for overlays (like venue maps).
      static java.lang.String SATELLITE_DAY
      Satellite tile scheme presented in "day" colors.
      static java.lang.String TERRAIN_DAY
      Terrain bitmap scheme presented in "day" colors.

        public static final java.lang.String SATELLITE_DAY
